Biast=3DBiased.  :p

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 07, 2002 10:24:50 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Nice group...? 100% PURE BULLSHIT!

Very well, you are entitled to your own opinion, regardless as to=20
how incorrect and biast it may be. Your opinions, however, should=20
not be posted in this rpg. Slights against people in the rpg, and=20
outside of it, are not to be tolerated, especially when I know=20
exactly the reason you posted this.

If people, moderators in fact, in the dbzsf rpg are willing to cut=20
down one of their members due to likes and dislikes, then why would=20
anyone ever join?

Also, I'd appreciate it if nobody bothered reply to this message,=20
and any other messages regarding this topic, it isn't worthy of=20
anyone's time.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Well, actually, ass kissing does go over well in NBW. I'm not=20
that surprised you came on over to leave your lip imprints=20
everywhere, Cassidy. You are queen of ass kissing. And you couldn't=20
be more incorrect about the people here. The people here are=20
complete asswipes who cannot resist putting my, Lurker and former=20
member Hollywood Narrator's posts down. Well, not really me, because=20
you all thought I was DEAD, eh? Well, if I was, it'd be better then=20
this. This RPG has fallen from grace, and it ain't gonna get up. I=20
used to be able to squeeze some fun out this RPG, but that time is=20
gone. Ever since the restart, this RPG has been resisting the fact=20
that it just needs to lie down in it's own grave that it's very own=20
members and moderators have dug. The restart introduced brand new=20
sparkling fresh rules! Like a 5 character limit! And what a crock of=20
shit this was! I was going to leave then, but stayed anyway, because=20
of my wanting to keep this RPG far from death. I realize now, that=20
it isn't possible. Not when you have shit for brains like Cardhead=20
and Airly here. And Airly, you bitch, in case you did not know, you=20
introduced a new misery to my life in my time of being here. I have=20
put up with your shitty English and god awful posts, filled with=20
modes of ridiculous attacks and ignoring my attacks. I could not be=20
happier as I bid you all a middle finger, with the exception of=20
Lurker. I will remember this RPG, for being where I first met him.=20
And before I go, I want to wish Airly a lightening bolt to the=20
skull, and Cassidy, you will soon find that if you post, you be put=20
down, and that the only one in this RPG with any sense is Lurker and=20
that you will soon come to regret your ass kissing. Lurker, see you=20
in the INCREDIBLY AWESOME DBZSF, MAAAAAAAANNNNN!!!!! And bye to you=20
all.
>   ----- Original Message -----=20
>   From: Hop Along Cassidy=20
>   To: nbwrpg@y...=20
>   Sent: Wednesday, August 07, 2002 2:20 PM
>   Subject: Nice group... ^.^
>=20
>=20
>   OOC: Hi, everyone. ^_^ I know this is sort of out of the blue,=20
but I just felt the need to compliment NBW RPG. It seems like a very=20
nice RPG, if you ask me. Most of the writers are very good, and=20
their posts seem well written. I really do enjoy looking through the=20
posts. Haha, I don't understand a lot of stuff, because I don't know=20
much about Neo Beast Wars, but I do like how this RPG is built. You=20
guys do an excellent job, and I thought you deserved to hear it from=20
someone who's not really in the RPG. ^_^ All of you are quite lucky=20
to have such a great owner who keeps the place in shape and=20
together. But, what's an RPG without the members? ^.~ Well, before I=20
end up writing a speech so long that you guys forget what I'm=20
talking about (hee hee, trust me, I can do it... ^_~) I guess I had=20
better shut up. ^_^ You guys are terrific! Keep up the good work,=20
and support each other so this RPG will last! I just know you guys!=20
can do it! *cheers* NBWRPG! NBWRPG! NBWRPG!...
>=20
>   With bushels of love,
>=20
>   *~-Cassidy-~*
>=20
>=20
> -------------------------------------------------------------------
